author: Richárd Hanák
comment: Is it possible to rearrange the sequence of the players? Btw nice app with the Best and most userfriendly ui in the market  Update : it's perfect now 😉

reply.author: r2.projects
reply.content:
Hello Richárd, 
thanks for your feedback!
Yes, using the newest update you can change the players order. Have fun!
Your r2projects-Team

author: Martin Meinke
comment: Awesome app!  Finally an use-case for my Chromecast! Even-though I got sausage-fingers, I could easily enter scores from my smartwatch.  I would love to have some motivating Phil Taylor impressions though!

reply.author: r2.projects
reply.content:
Hello Martin, 
thank you for your Feedback - I'm happy you like it! 
I'll think about integrating some Phil Taylor impressions :)
Your r2projects-Team

author: Nikunj Pathak
comment: Can someone please tell me how to play?

reply.author: r2.projects
reply.content:
Hello Nikunj, 
thank you for giving the App a second chance! 
It supports your real dart game by counting the score and managing the gameplay. 
So just invite some friends, grab your darts and start a game. The standing can be displayed on your TV.
If you need some help, feel free to contact us via info@r2projects.de.
Your r2.projects-Team

title: Could be good... But before I delete...

author: Jared Carbaugh
comment: Incorporate more games then just x01 like cricket etc and it would be a 5 star. Only darts scoreboard i have compatible with chromecast.

reply.author: r2.projects
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback!
Yes - we're working on adding more features like other game-modes to our app.
Check the next updates for some features!
